summary:
Adam B. Schiff (Democrat-CA) said: Thanks for the shout-out, Mr. Former President. As for your statement that the attack on the Capitol would never have happened if “the people in charge had done their job”

You do realize that you were in charge on January 6th? Bernard Sanders (Independent-VT) said: We must stand up to a corrupt oligarchy. It’s time to divorce our children from the federal department of education. EndHate https://t.co/mperZS30G0

Elizabeth Warren (Democrat-MA) said: I’m glad to stand with tribal nations and Native communities as we celebrate their remarkable contributions, cultures, and resilience on #IndigenousPeoplesDay. Tammy Duckworth (Democrat-IL) said: On #IndigenousPeoplesDay, I hope folks use this time to reflect and learn from our history. It is our solemn obligation to uplift their communities to ensure we all grow and prosper. For too long, they have been brutalized, discriminated against, and taken for granted. Kyrsten Sinema (Democrat-AZ) said: Indigenous communities and contributions are part of what makes #State48 so great!

Marjorie Taylor Greene (Republican-GA) said: Nancy Pelosi has brought us back to raise the debt ceiling to pay for their outrageous spending plan. As I went on the House floor to move to adjourn to shut down Congress and send the Speaker home, she put us in recess to stop me. This is your regular reminder that every single republican in Congress voted to block you from getting stimulus money. Not only does Biden’s budget have specific provisions that will directly damage businesses in GA, the entire bill would plunge our state into socialism https://t.co/ocddDlIXmV
